## Facade.assets property

Copy static assets during compilation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
assets: assets.facade;
```

## Remarks

You may specify paths with a string literal or glob pattern.

## Example

Copy \*\*src/images\*\* to \*\*dist/images\*\*

```js
app.assets(['src/images'])
```
